argoFloats 0.1.2

A sample index of biogeochemical-argo profiles

Source: R/AllClass.R
indexBgc.Rd

This is created by subsetting a global index to the 39 BGC Argo profiles that were within a 300km radius of Marsh Harbour, Abaco Island, Bahamas, as of 2020 March 23, using the following code.

library(argoFloats)
indexAll &lt;- getIndex(file="bgc")
indexBgc &lt;- subset(indexAll, circle=list(longitude=-77.06, latitude=26.54, radius=300))
save(indexBgc, file="indexBgc.rda")
tools::resaveRdaFiles('indexBgc.rda')

See also

Other datasets provided with argoFloats: indexMerged, index

Examples

library(argoFloats)
data(indexBgc)
plot(indexBgc)
summary(indexBgc)
#> argoFloats summary

#> 
#> * type:        index
#> * server:      ftp://usgodae.org/pub/outgoing/argo
